timeline.bodyText: Could we be consistent for the two config properties for charsets and time zones?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
Well I see two ways how to be consistent: (a) align with the native-image flag (my current proposal) or (b) align with other available properties.
(a) Might be less confusing for the people knowing the native-image flags.
I have no clear preference and I am ready to go with all instead of include if you and others prefer that.
replies.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: Yeah no OK, it makes perfect sense.
replies.author: gsmet
